items.question: How much does web design and development usually cost?
items.answer: Most projects fall between S/500 and S/1800, but the final cost depends on scope. We prefer a fixed price with milestone-based deliveries.

items.question: How long does a project usually take?
items.answer: Typically between 2 and 6 weeks, depending on complexity and level of customization.

items.question: How do you handle revisions and feedback during the design process?
items.answer: We use Figma and other collaborative environments to gather feedback and review in real time.

items.question: Can your creative agency accommodate tight deadlines?
items.answer: Yes, in many cases we can. However, quality always takes priority over speed.

items.question: What support do you offer after launch?
items.answer: We include technical support and maintenance by default in all our plans. We also offer extended plans if needed.

items.question: Do digital marketing services have an additional cost?
items.answer: Yes, they are quoted separately depending on your goals and monthly scope.
